summary: End portal and end gateway textures expand as the player travels further from the block
Lead/fishing line is no longer affected by the fog from powder snow/lava
Dying ender dragon is rendered too bright
Being inside of a block no longer shows the block texture
The background opacity of command syntax help is affected when highlighting text
Entity shadows can be seen whilst inside of powder snow/lava
Holding an enchanted item allows seeing through blocks
Slime blocks, honey blocks, stained glass, and ice are fully lit when moved by pistons
Fishing line only starts on half distance between the fishing rod and bobber (Apple M1 only)
Spyglass allows looking through blocks
Social interactions scroll bar appears broken
Chat scroll bar is offset
Entity hitboxes can be seen whilst inside of powder snow/lava
Reloading resource packs no longer shows the progress bar while the transparent background is shown
World border does not render when below the world
World border is shown as a solid color when picking up items or experience orbs
Charged creeper layer makes clouds and entities invisible
The background opacity of subtitles and chat, are affected by a potion effect UI fading out
The wither's wither armor has a blue aura around it
Transparency buffers start with blue background instead of empty background
Fire is rendered dark in the player/horse/llama UI
Cave ceilings and floors sometimes too flat or blocky
Spyglass has a gradient effect while freezing
The background of hover-event text becomes blue when text is selected in an anvil or chat
When selecting text in the end, the sky gets highlighted
The red flash when a mob is hurt/killed appears to be slightly dimmed
World border is occasionally shown as a solid color upon being loaded
Mojang logo screen flashes blue before changing to red
You can see block hitboxes very clearly whilst in powder snow/lava
World border is white
M1 ARM Macs crash when using Fabulous Graphics mode as was the case in older versions, but no lack of support warning is shown
Cave Vines can generate without supporting blocks
Two white lines appear on the Mojang loading screen
Ambient occlusion of the player seen in the survival inventory has changed
At sunset, a blue line appears in the northern and southern skies
Caves generate with very blocky areas
Noise cave entrances cause unnatural, smooth edges in terrain
Right clicking to open alternate recipes does not show the recipes
Debug pie has purple box when moving an enchanted item
Shulkers do not flash red when hurt or killed
The nether portal overlay no longer renders, whilst using fast graphics
Floating water generates excessively in lush caves
Glowing effect no longer changes to team color
The green nausea overlay no longer renders
The carved pumpkin overlay turns the screen completely black when using fast graphics
Red vignette shown when outside the world border is too intense
Broken spyglass overlay on fast graphics
With fast graphics, the freezing overlay renders black, and covers the whole screen black in first person
Smooth lighting has brighter outlines
Cannot enchant items
Banners are unimpacted by light levels
Mipmapping causes some block faces to become too dark
Hanging roots can generate hanging on other hanging roots, making them float
Screen turns dark grey when switching dimension
Water has no fog anymore
Debug pie is blacked out
Debug chunk borders don't render properly
Lightning rod still can't be waterlogged
Some blocks generate at wrong Y height in a superflat world
stat.fallOneCm is not updated when falling onto a block above y=316
Potential optimization target in DepthBasedReplacingBaseStoneSource
Flat "slices" of terrain generating in cracks
Teams become dysfunctional when any entity leaves the team
When replacing tuff, ores still generate with a "stone" background below y=0
Sugar cane item texture is no longer accurate from 13w36a onwards
Player takes no fall damage on blocks above y=316
Gilded blackstone texture does not match the new side texture of blackstone
Redstone Ready and Water World presets have the default spawn point at wrong Y-level
Sky going dark y level ignores data pack dimension y axis limits (minecraft:overworld effects)
Azaleas cannot be used as a fuel
Snow layers in "Snowy Kingdom" superflat preset generate 64 blocks above the ground
Superflat worlds start generating at negative coordinates, causing a dark horizon
Big dripleaf won't drop the item if the top is underwater
It is not possible to create a superflat world with over 256 layers
Setting a lectern on fire causes z-fighting
Crash upon importing world generation settings with a layer that is less than 0 blocks high
Moss appropriate tool is axe rather than hoe
Cave vines body and cave vines head share the same name
Bone meal cannot be used on dripleaf stems
Hanging roots don't get destroyed by flowing water
Cave vines head and body emit different light levels
Cave vines do not slow you down like other vines
Cave vines cannot be climbed
Removing the support block for hanging roots allows it to float
Cave vine blocks are inconsistent in ID from other similar blocks
Removing the block supporting a spore blossom allows the spore blossom to float
Spectators can't see through powder snow
Crash upon importing world generation settings with over 256 layers
Parity issue: Copper blocks cannot be waxed by either using honeycomb items on them or using dispensers with honeycombs.
Waxed Copper Block cannot be crafted back into ingots
Cannot compost glow lichen
Bone Meal can still be used on a Glow Lichen when it is unable to grow
Player lighting is inconsistent in the inventory and appears darker on the front
Trident returning to owner not in the same world can cause permanent player kick
Moving water with a piston and amethyst cluster
Frozen hearts in hardcore mode look identical to frozen hearts in survival mode
World border texture moves up and down with the player
World Border is rendered upside down
Blocks dripstone can be attached to are inconsistent
Lightning rod can spawn skeleton horses with skeletons
Tinted glass is not included in the impermeable tag
Pushing an amethyst cluster off of a block with a 1-tick pulse using a sticky piston doesn't drop any items
When filling a lava/powder snow cauldron with lava/powder snow, it is placed on the ground instead of in the cauldron
Mobs can spawn on tinted glass
Spyglass use statistic never increases
Tinted Glass suffocates entities inside of it
Inconsistency: Breaking amethyst crystals with hands doesn't drop the item, but breaking the block they are placed on drops them
Amethyst crystal cluster drops items when block is moved directly by a piston without actually breaking the block
block.amethyst_block.chime has no subtitle
Area effect cloud does not enforce a maximum radius
Houses in Zombie Villages disappear when spawned using /locate
Floating pixel in the tailfin of a guardian/elder guardian
Jigsaw Structures causing DataFixer spam
Carved pumpkins and jack o'lanterns create swastikas
Smoker's top and bottom textures have inconsistently colored pixels
Blocks in recipe book groups are rendered in front of item tooltips
Painting back texture has not been updated with the texture update
Jungle door inventory texture is outdated
Overworld wood signs use the outdated wood texture on all sides
Brewing Stand bottle outline incorrect
Spectral arrow texture on item and entity aren't consistent
Librarian and zombie librarian torso top texture is incorrect
Scroll bar goes higher than chat overlay
When clearing water with sponges, sometimes lily pads will keep floating
Spectators can't see through lava
False negatives during occlusion culling
Lava / water / powder snow bucket desync when using it while rapidly turning
Players are able to create ghost lily pads
Snow covered grass/podzol/mycelium block side texture does not match original block
